summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help the federal government save money, address issues on our High Risk List, and significantly improve government operations. This letter to the Department of Housing and Urban Development outlines 11 open recommendations that it should prioritize. title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Housing and Urban Development
